mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crossroads Church Cemetery, Locust Grove District
mdRecord.dcterms:description: N 37 01.836, W 80 07.890 Located about 3 miles SW from intersection of Route 221 and Hummingbird Lane. This cemetery is also referred to as Prillaman Cemetery. This is now a Holiness Church.
